accounts_listing.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type !== 'function' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit(doc.pvt_account_id, null); }

crossbar_listing.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type !== 'function' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; var enabled = (typeof doc.enabled === 'undefined') ? true : doc.enabled; emit([doc.pvt_account_id, doc._id], {'id': doc._id, 'trigger': doc.trigger, 'name':doc.name, 'function_js': doc.function_js, 'enabled':enabled, 'disable_reason':doc.pvt_disabled_message}); }

functions_listing.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type !== 'function' || doc.pvt_deleted || doc.enabled === false) return; emit([doc.pvt_account_id, doc._id], {'id': doc._id, 'trigger': doc.trigger, 'name':doc.name, 'function_js': doc.function_js}); }

trigger_listing.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type !== 'function' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit(doc.trigger, doc.pvt_account_id); }
